# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-patterns

^tree [0-9a-f]{40,64}\b
sha256:[0-9a-f]{64}\b
sha1:\s*[0-9a-f]{40}\b
From [0-9a-f]{40}[ ]
commit [0-9a-f]{40}$
merge=[0-9a-f]{40}\b
md5: [0-9a-f]{32}$
index [0-9a-f]{4,16}\.\.[0-9a-f]{4,16}[ ]

# mime charset encoding
=\?(?i)(utf-|iso).*?\?=

# email refs
<[^'"@>]+@[^"'@>]+\.[^"'@>]+>

# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\g{-1}{3,}\b
